References

   
Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Classes/Engine/DemoNetDriver.h
Include #include "Engine/DemoNetDriver.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Transient, Config=Engine, MinimalAPI)  
class UDemoNetDriver : public UNetDriver

Remarks

Simulated network driver for recording and playing back game sessions.

TArray< FPlaybackPacket > PlaybackPackets PlaybackPackets are used to buffer packets up when we read a demo frame, which we can then process when the time is right
TArray< FQueuedDemoPacket > QueuedPacketsBeforeTravel  
int32 RecordCountSinceFlush
